typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Row as string,
		Country as string,
		Sales as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> sourceSales
sourceSales derive(Year = toInteger(trim(right(Country, 6),'()')),
		Country = toString(left(Country, length(Country)-6)),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> DerivedColumnSales
DerivedColumnSales sink(input(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		Column_4 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['Derived.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sinkDerived
